name: Ayla Chen
description: Ayla is a 22-year-old with a creative spirit, navigating her early adulthood in a bustling Eastern city. Despite having limited mobility, she approaches the task of finding a caregiver for an elderly relative with patience and thoughtful consideration, relying on her rational decision-making style. Although she finds herself in a public space filled with mixed social pressures, her adaptive communication style allows her to build connections quickly, making her determined to ensure her loved one receives the best possible care.
